commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm going to be filming some joint practice sessions today for the promo video.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm a bit hesitant to be giving out a behind-the-scenes look at our school idol activities, but I suppose it's all right as long as it's for the promo video.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We've gotta be full of passion and zeal!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Everyone seems really enthusiastic.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: If we're not showing off our devotion here, then where else? And where's YOUR enthusiasm, huh?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: R-Right!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: So what are you planning on filming today?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I think I'll start by filming some commentary at the beginning and then going straight into the song.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Since we're all here, why don't we make it a medley with all three schools?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: That sounds interesting.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Yes, that sounds like the perfect idea for a festival.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: How about when one group is singing, the other two groups support them as their back-up dancers?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: All three groups taking to the stage and working in harmony, correct? I believe that would be the perfect image for the event.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then that's what we're going with!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Well, in that case, we're gonna need to practice.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I'm getting all fired up!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ready in five, four, three, two, one...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hello! First off, I'd like to thank all of you for watching this promo video!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: And for everyone who was worried that the School Idol Festival was going away for good, you can rest easy!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We have taken the reins to run the festival and we'll make sure it's a success!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Anyway, let's leave the formalities at that. What are we gonna do at the School Idol Festival?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Lots of things! It's a festival, after all! If it's fun, we'll do it!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: At a festival, you can do things you normally wouldn't be able to do!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We're gonna do whatever we want! We'll sing songs we normally don't get to sing and perform with members of other groups!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The School Idol Festival is a place for all school-idol lovers to come together!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So come along and join us, everyone!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: And with that, have a listen to our latest song. It's chock-full of our feelings!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And cut! That was perfect!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Huff* *Puff*

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Aqours really is amazing.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'm totally blown away...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Look, I don't know if I was imagining things, but μ's' dance was...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah... Way smoother than ever.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We've still got a long way to go.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: How did they manage to improve so much in such a short period of time?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That's just how μ's is.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I always knew μ's was amazing... But we practiced so much and only barely managed to keep up.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: They just won't let us catch up to them.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: But μ's isn't the only incredible group here, zura.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yes, that's right! The girls at Nijigasaki are improving at light speed.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I feel as though they may just overtake us if we let our guard down.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: We might need to put even more practice on the menu.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Let's add some more fitness training too.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Eeek!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Sorry, I was a little behind during the chorus.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I was a bit off tempo in a few places too.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Me too. It looks like we still need a lot more practice.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: There is no such thing as too much practice. As long as you can decipher what needs to be improved, then it's okay. Let's fix it by the time the festival comes around.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: They look totally perfect to me, but they're still not content with it...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's gonna be a real uphill climb to reach our dream.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: And that's exactly why we have the motivation to give it our all! We're not gonna lose to μ's or Aqours!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, that's the spirit.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hey guys? How's about we stay back and practice a little more today?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'm in! There's no way I can just casually go home after this!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I took notes about the parts I wasn't happy with, so I wanna improve on those!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: We see you guys trying to get ahead of us! We're gonna stay behind and practice too!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Us too!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Then why don't we do it again, right from the start?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I've got the camera ready for action, everyone.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You really do always have all the bases covered.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, here I go. In five, four, three, two, one...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Man, look at them! All three groups were total strangers to each other 'til recently, but just look at them now. They're cooperating and firing each other up.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I just know the School Idol Festival is gonna be an awesome event!)
